trans-unit.source: Exception class to indicate that the policy supplied by the recipient could not be validated.
trans-unit.target: 异常类，以指示无法验证对接收方提供的策略。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref> class.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error and takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>属性为系统提供的消息的描述错误并将当前系统区域性考虑在内的新实例。</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The content of the message should also be understandable to the user.
trans-unit.target: 消息的内容也应该是为用户所理解的。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref> class with serialization information and streaming context specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref>的序列化信息和指定的流上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 在反序列化，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象过程中调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception that is being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>保存关于所引发的异常的序列化的对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含有关源或目标的上下文信息的对象。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref> class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.PolicyValidationException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 前一个异常的直接结果应包含中的前一个异常的引用引发的异常，<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回相同的值传递到构造函数中，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the error.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
